info.title: Decrement a slider to the minimum value in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSliderAndSetValueToFive
setupScript.description: sets focus on the slider, and sets its value to five stars

user: With focus on the 'Rating' slider, set its value to zero stars.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Rating' slider, set its value to zero stars.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
